entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor overload resolution failure diagnostic for first class span Contains scenario #78211

Closed

  • EnC: avoid cascading rebuilds if project reference copies output assembly #78217
  • EnC: Include projects that depend on a project with changed public APIs in projectsToRebuild #78218
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10518.148 #78216
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10518.29 #78209

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ApplyUpdates API to account for no-effect changes #78220
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: honor OverloadResolutionPriority attribute #78219
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: adjust specialname rules #78215
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: apply inconsistent accessibility check to static members too #78214
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Move assembly versions back to 4.14.0.0" #78210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Adding new EA api at 'Features' layer for unit testing ot use #78175
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move DiagnosticService impl down to Features layer #78155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement ref safety analysis for instance compound assignment operators #78199
    Area-Compilers, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Clean up output capture on .NET Core #78205
    Area-Compilers
